metadata.title: CVE-2024-50056 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: gadget: uvc: Fix ERR_PTR dereference in uvc_v4l2.cFix potential dereferencing of ERR_PTR() in find_format_by_pix()and uvc_v4l2_enum_format().Fix the following smatch errors:drivers/usb/gadget/function/uvc_v4l2.c:124 find_format_by_pix()error: 'fmtdesc' dereferencing possible ERR_PTR()drivers/usb/gadget/function/uvc_v4l2.c:392 uvc_v4l2_enum_format()error: 'fmtdesc' dereferencing possible ERR_PTR()Also, fix similar issue in uvc_v4l2_try_format() for potentialdereferencing of ERR_PTR().

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-oracle package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
